916410.name: Trap Part 2, 3 and 4
916410.description:
-This DLC unlocks the full Trap game, currently Chapter 2 and 3 are included.
-Chapter 4 is under development and will be added later.
-Not to mention the updates that will improve the game.
-Count more than one hour of play per chapter.
-More and more captivating atmospheres.



"After receiving a disturbing letter from his brother, our protagonist decides to go looking for him at the hotel Beryl. He will soon discover the strangeness of the places, the objects, the paintings, the shadows and the terrifying models moving, speaking, living of their own will."
916410.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语
